    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Utrjevanje branja</string>
            <string language="en">Improving the reading</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbessern des Messwertes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amélioration de la lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Melhorando a leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Migliorare la lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βελτίωση της ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mejorar la lectura</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Individualna vaja za utrjevanje branja, za prijaznejši način pridobivanja sposobnosti gladkega branja.</string>
            <string language="en">Individual exercise to improve the reading, friendly way to gain skill of reading smoothly.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kasetofon</string>
            <string language="en">cassette recorder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">individualno delo</string>
            <string language="en">individualized teaching</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einzelne Übung, zum des Messwertes, freundliche 
Methode zu verbessern, Fähigkeit von glatt lesen zu gewinnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercice individuel pour améliorer la lecture, 
voie amicale de gagner la compétence de la lecture sans à-coup.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercício individual para melhorar a leitura, 
maneira amigável ganhar a habilidade da leitura lisamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazione specifica per migliorare la 
lettura, modo amichevole guadagnare abilità di lettura uniformemente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεμονωμένη άσκηση για να βελτιώσει την ανάγνωση, 
φιλικός τρόπος να κερδηθεί η ικανότητα να διαβάσει ομαλά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicio individual para mejorar la lectura, 
manera cómoda de ganar la habilidad de la lectura suavemente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kassette Schreiber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">individualisierter Unterricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">magnétophone à cassettes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignement individualisé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensino individualized</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">registratore a cassetta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegnamento individualizzato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lectura</string>

          <keyword>
